column2: The goal of the CARE System is to allow a
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: learner to look for instances of sentences labeled
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: with moves. For this purpose, the system is
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: developed with three text boxes for learners to
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: enter queries in English (as shown in Figure3.):
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-colon

column2: • Single word query (i.e. directly input one
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent font-largest indented-line longer-tail itemization

column2: word to query)
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line shorter-tail headchar-lower above-line-space

column2: • Multi-word query (i.e. enter the result
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent font-largest hanged-line longer-tail line-space itemization

column2: show to find citations that contain the
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent font-largest indented-line headchar-lower

column2: three words, “the”, “paper” and “show”
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column left-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: and all the derivatives)
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column left-indent right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower above-line-space

column2: • Corpus selection (i.e. learners can focus on
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column left-indent font-largest hanged-line longer-tail line-space itemization

column2: a corpus in a specific domain)
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line shorter-tail itemization headchar-lower above-double-space above-line-space

column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified hanged-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: 6 Conclusion
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column right-indent font-larger aligned-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading1 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: In this paper, we have presented a method for
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: computational analysis of move structures in
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: RAs' abstracts and addressed its pedagogical
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: applications. The method involves learning the
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: inter-move relationships, and some labeling rules
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: we proposed. We used a large number of
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: abstracts automatically acquired from the Web
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: for training, and exploited the HMM to tag
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: sentences with the move of a given abstract.
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: Evaluation shows that the proposed method
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: outperforms previous work with higher precision.
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: Using the processed result, we built a prototype
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: concordance, CARE, enriched with words,
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: phrases and moves. It is expected that NNS can
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: benefit from such a system in learning how to
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: write an abstract for a research article.
